page.title: 09Todwick School
page.content: In 1968{Todwick School}was completed. In school we have six full time teachers, ten other staff, six ladies in the kitchen and three dining room ladies. We have a 'lollipop lady' that helps us over the road, two cleaning ladies and one caretaker. In school we have 169 children altogether with the largest class having 32 children and the smallest 24. The youngest children are four years old and we leave the primary school at the age of eleven. In class we do Maths which seems to be harder as you get older and older . We do English and topic work about animals,people and mechanical things. I think art is the best thing of all when you can paint a picture or make a model out of clay, plaster, wood or card.
